_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
sn1.35:2.1+sn1.35:3.4: a deity of the Disdainful Group
sn1.35:4.1+sn1.35:5.4: a deity of the Disdainful Group
sn1.35:7.1+sn1.35:7.4: a deity of the Disdainful Group
sn1.35:8.1+sn1.35:8.4: a deity of the Disdainful Group
sn1.35:9.1+sn1.35:9.4: a deity of the Disdainful Group
sn1.35:10.1+sn1.35:11.6: a deity of the Disdainful Group
before^sn1.35:10.1^where: Jeta's Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery near Sāvatthī
where: Jeta's Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery near Sāvatthī
